jobDescription: Heritage Community is looking for Registered Nurses (RN) who can direct, administer and document care given to residents.The Registered Nurse (RN) will also assist in the supervision of CNA’s and this position will work twelve (12) hours shifts from 6:30pm - 7:00am.*Licensed to practice nursing in the State of Michigan*Long term care experience is highly desirable*Dependable, customer service oriented, and excellent communication skills*Must have knowledge of Michigan Nurse Practice Act
